resources.string: Welcome to Food Manager.\nClick the Button to Begin
List of Items That Will Expire Soon
Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested
This is a help guide for users of Rasoi, on Android devices

On the dashboard navigation page, there is a gold floating action button with a black cross. Click on that icon and it will lead you to a page where you can enter information about the food item you want to add.

You can manage items in your list by tapping on their name when viewing in the food list mode. When tapping on the item, it will bring you to a page with the details regarding your item. If you would like to edit fields on that food item, click the gold floating action button with a pen icon and fill in the fields you\'d like to modify. If you want to delete a food item, just click the red button with the words DELETE marked underneath the food details.

So far, there are analytics showing the total number of items you have added in your list as well as a Pie Chart describing the different categories you have and how many frozen items acquired. If there are other statistics you\'d like to see but is not present, contact us.

Rasoi is an app created by Raveena Nair in Summer of 2020. This app is one dedicated to abolishing the problem of forgetting what is in your refrigerator. When spending lots of hours at home with the family during quarantine time due to Corona, it was made apparent that a common problem in my house hold would be to forget the items that were put in the refrigerator. Many times my father would buy items from the grocery store, but would forget to tell my mother that certain items had been bought, and before you knew it, the items could not be used any more.\n\nRasoi was made to eliminate that problem and help remind users what items were in their refrigerator, and when they would expire. Food waste is a major problem, especially countries like the United States, and so everyone can do a simple part in reducing waste by being mindful of the items they buy.
If you have any questions, concerns, or feedback about the Rasoi app, please fill out the Contact form.
